scripts.build: npm -w packages/studio run build && npm -w packages/shadows run build
scripts.studio: rm -rf packages/studio/dist/client && cd demos/studio-app && npm run dev & cd demos/studio-app && npx tsx ../../packages/studio/src/cli.ts
scripts.shadows: rm -rf packages/shadows/dist/client && cd demos/tailwind-shadows-app && npm run dev & cd demos/tailwind-shadows-app && npx tsx ../../packages/shadows/src/cli.ts
scripts.shadows:bootstrap: rm -rf packages/shadows/dist/client && cd demos/bootstrap-app && npm run dev & cd demos/bootstrap-app && npx tsx ../../packages/shadows/src/cli.ts
scripts.shadows:css-vars: rm -rf packages/shadows/dist/client && cd demos/css-variables-app && npm run dev & cd demos/css-variables-app && npx tsx ../../packages/shadows/src/cli.ts
scripts.shadows:w3c-tokens: rm -rf packages/shadows/dist/client && cd demos/w3c-tokens-app && npm run dev & cd demos/w3c-tokens-app && npx tsx ../../packages/shadows/src/cli.ts
scripts.shadows:studio-app: rm -rf packages/shadows/dist/client && cd demos/studio-app && npm run dev & cd demos/studio-app && npx tsx ../../packages/shadows/src/cli.ts
